enableCifsMount.name: Mount SMB share by CIFS
enableCifsMount.name[zh_CN]: 通过 CIFS 挂载 SMB 共享
enableCifsMount.description[zh_CN]: 通过内核支持的 CIFS 挂载 SMB 共享文件夹，性能会更好。重启后生效。
enableCifsMount.description: Mount SMB share folders via CIFS which is supported by kernel and have a better performance. Take effective after reboot.

cifsMountOptionOverride.name: CIFS mount option override list
cifsMountOptionOverride.name[zh_CN]: CIFS 挂载选项覆盖列表
cifsMountOptionOverride.description[zh_CN]: 这些输入将用于覆盖 CIFS 挂载选项。仅当 enableCifsMount 启用时有效。
cifsMountOptionOverride.description: The inputs will be used to override the CIFS mount options. Valid only if enableCifsMount is on.

deviceCapacityDisplay.name: Device capacity display method
deviceCapacityDisplay.description[zh_CN]: 以磁盘大小（0）或文件系统大小（1）显示设备容量。其余值视作 0。
deviceCapacityDisplay.description: Display device capacity as disk size (0) or file system size (1). The remaining values are treated as 0.

aliasSupportedProtocolList.name: Network protocol device alias
aliasSupportedProtocolList.description[zh_CN]: 配置支持别名设置的网络协议
aliasSupportedProtocolList.description: Configures network protocols that support alias settings
